item.title: 马歇尔-韦斯（Marshall Wace）设立新办事处，加入阿布扎比对冲基金大潮
item.description: 伦敦最大的对冲基金之一马歇尔-韦斯（Marshall Wace）加入了全球投资公司向阿联酋首都扩张的行列。【原文：Marshall Wace, one of London’s biggest hedge funds, has joined the flurry of global investment firms expanding to the United Arab Emirates capital.】

item.title: Centrica 宣布 3 亿英镑股票回购计划延期
item.description: Centrica Plc 将延长其向股东返还现金的计划，同时公司将单独推进其在英国的氢气投资计划。【原文：Centrica Plc will extend its program to return cash to shareholders, while the company separately moves ahead with its investment plans for hydrogen in the UK.】

item.title: 欧洲债券成功发行后，尼日利亚债务销售需求旺盛
item.description: 尼日利亚成功发行 22 亿美元的欧元债券后，投资者受到高收益率和尼日利亚货币光明前景的诱惑，纷纷涌入尼日利亚短期国债市场。【原文：Investors are piling into short-term Nigerian government debt, lured by high yields and a brightening outlook for the currency following the country’s successful launch of a $2.2 billion eurobond.】

item.title: 泰晤士河水务公司警告现金即将耗尽，债务不断增加
item.description: 泰晤士水务公司（Thames Water Utilities Ltd.）表示，截至 10 月份的六个月内，公司债务增至 158 亿英镑（约合 202 亿美元），并警告称如果不注入现金，公司可能无法继续运营。【原文：Thames Water Utilities Ltd. said it’s debt pile grew to £15.8 billion ($20.2 billion) in the six months to October, as it warned it may not be able to continue operating without a cash injection.】

item.title: 匈牙利通货膨胀率在福林跌至两年低点之际加速上升
item.description: 由于食品和服务成本的上升以及福林的暴跌，匈牙利的通货膨胀率连续第二个月加速上升，使物价增长接近中央银行容忍范围的上限。【原文：Inflation in Hungary accelerated for a second month, as the rise in the cost of food and services and a plunge in the forint pushed price growth closer to the upper limit of the central bank’s tolerance band.】

item.title: 外币交易成为南非金融集团议程的重中之重
item.description: 一个金融高管小组正在起草允许在南非股票和债券交易所进行外币交易的提案，因为这个非洲大陆最大的经济体正致力于巩固其作为地区金融中心的地位。【原文：A group of finance executives is drafting proposals to allow foreign-currency transactions on stock and bond exchanges in South Africa as the continent’s biggest economy aims to bolster its standing as a regional financial hub.】

item.title: Grifols 任命两名新董事会成员，为对冲基金梅森赢得胜利
item.description: Grifols SA 是一家因今年早些时候遭到做空者攻击而陷入困境的制药商，该公司任命了两名新的董事会成员，因为它面临着以对冲基金 Mason Capital Management LLC 为首的一群小股东的压力。【原文：Grifols SA, the drugmaker reeling from a short-seller attack earlier this year, named two new board members, as it faces pressure from a group of small shareholders led by hedge fund Mason Capital Management LLC.】

item.title: 挪威核心通货膨胀率打破长达一年的放缓趋势
item.description: 挪威公布的月度核心通胀率出现了一年来的首次回升，超出了分析师的预期，并支持了央行在3月份之前不会降息的预测。【原文：Norway posted the first pick-up in monthly core inflation in a year, exceeding analyst expectations and backing the central bank’s projections for no interest-rate cuts until March.】

item.title: Ashtead 将把主要上市地迁往美国，对伦敦造成新的打击
item.description: 建筑设备租赁公司 Ashtead Group Plc 提议将其主要上市地从伦敦迁往美国，这给英国股市带来了最新的打击。【原文：Construction equipment rental company Ashtead Group Plc delivered the latest blow to the UK stock market as it proposed moving its primary listing from London to the US.】

item.title: 通胀风险挥之不去，捷克利率制定者考虑暂停降息
item.description: 捷克央行董事会一位支持长达一年的货币宽松周期的成员表示，捷克持续的通胀压力可能导致最早在本月暂停降息。【原文：Persistent inflation pressure in the Czech Republic may warrant a pause in interest-rate cuts as early as this month, according to a member of the central bank’s board who has supported the yearlong monetary easing cycle.】

item.title: 埃及通胀率自七月以来首次放缓
item.description: 尽管最近削减了燃料补贴，但埃及的通货膨胀率在连续三个月加速后有所放缓。【原文：Egypt’s inflation slowed after three months of acceleration, despite a recent cut in fuel subsidies.】

item.title: South32 下调莫桑比克铝冶炼厂产量预期
item.description: 澳大利亚矿业公司 South32 Ltd. 已撤销了其在莫桑比克铝冶炼厂的生产指导，原因是这个非洲国家发生了大规模的致命抗议活动。【原文：Australian miner South32 Ltd. has withdrawn production guidance for its aluminum smelter in Mozambique due to widespread and deadly protests in the African country.】

item.title: 分析显示，英国央行在 2025 年后降息空间不大
item.description: 据彭博经济公司（Bloomberg Economics）称，在面临经济过热和通胀重燃的风险之前，英格兰银行可以将借贷成本再下调五次至 3.5%。【原文：The Bank of England can cut borrowing costs five more times to 3.5% before it runs the risk of overheating the economy and reigniting inflation, according to Bloomberg Economics.】

item.title: 富时 100 指数直播：英国股市将在反弹后下滑
安联上调盈利目标，贝特承诺提高投资者回报率
item.description: 拥有债券管理公司太平洋投资管理公司（Pacific Investment Management Co.）的德国保险公司安联集团（Allianz SE）上调了中期主要利润目标，首席执行官奥利弗-贝特（Oliver Baete）誓言将更多资金返还给投资者。【原文：Allianz SE, the German insurer that owns bond manager Pacific Investment Management Co., raised its main medium-term profit target as Chief Executive Officer Oliver Baete vowed to return more money to investors.】

item.title: 世界银行因洪水和抗议活动下调肯尼亚经济增长预期
item.description: 据世界银行称，由于洪水和反政府抗议活动，肯尼亚经济正走向自 2020 年冠状病毒引发萎缩以来的最差表现。【原文：Kenya’s economy is heading for its worst performance since a coronavirus-induced contraction in 2020 because of floods and anti-government protests, according to the World Bank.】

item.title: 继 2024 年海湾地区最大首次公开募股之后，塔拉巴特公司在迪拜首次公开募股中崛起
item.description: Talabat Holding Plc 在迪拜的首次交易中走高，此前该公司在今年科技行业规模最大的首次公开募股中筹集了 20 多亿美元。【原文：Talabat Holding Plc advanced in its Dubai trading debut after raising more than $2 billion in the largest initial public offering for the tech sector this year.】

item.title: General Atlantic 新设阿布扎比办事处，加大对海湾地区的投入
item.description: 美国通用大西洋公司（General Atlantic）在阿布扎比设立了新的办事处，加入了众多在中东扩张的西方公司的行列，进一步向海湾地区挺进。【原文：General Atlantic is making a deeper push into the Gulf with a new office in Abu Dhabi, joining a slew of Western firms expanding in the Middle East.】

item.title: 乔克夏巨型 IPO 显示出与繁荣市场相反的疲软迹象
item.description: Kioxia Holdings Corp. 的首次公开募股规模巨大，但有一个迹象表明，投资者对其股票的需求可能不够强劲：与今年其他日本公司 97% 的首次公开募股不同，该公司的首次公开募股价格并没有达到或超过公司建议区间的上限。【原文：Kioxia Holdings Corp.’s mammoth initial public offering contains one sign that investor demand for its shares may lack strength: unlike 97% of IPOs by other Japanese firms this year, the deal didn’t price at the upper end of the firm’s proposed range or higher.】

item.title: 香港空头支票公司取消去SPAC后暂停交易
item.description: Vision Deal HK Acquisition Corp.与一家目标公司的合并未能实现，该公司从周二起暂停其股票和认股权证在香港的交易。【原文：Blank-check firm Vision Deal HK Acquisition Corp. suspended trading of its shares and warrants in Hong Kong starting Tuesday after its combination with a target company failed to materialize.】

item.title: 贝利看淡科技股，青睐 "无聊 "基建股
item.description: 以投资高速增长的科技股而闻名的 Baillie Gifford & Co.现在喜欢 "乏味 "的美国基础设施公司，因为它看到了多年投资不足后的建筑热潮。【原文：Baillie Gifford & Co., known for investing in hyper-growth tech stocks, now likes “boring” US infrastructure companies as it sees a building boom after many years of under-investment.】

item.title: 通胀掉包为选举年划上圆满句号
item.description:
在美国，你所在政党的表现就是你对经济表现的预期。共和党和民主党正在交换位置

。【原文：

In America, how your party is doing is how you expect the economy to perform. Republicans and Democrats are trading places

】

item.title: 人工智能需求持续增长，台积电 11 月销售额增长 34
item.description: 台湾积体电路制造股份有限公司 11 月份的销售额增长了 34%，反映出人工智能需求的持续增长，尽管人们担心数据中心建设将放缓。【原文：Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Co.’s sales rose 34% in November, reflecting sustained growth from AI demand despite concerns that datacenter building will slow.】

item.title: 据说 TeamViewer 接近收购凯雷投资的软件公司 1E
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，远程办公软件制造商 TeamViewer SE 接近从凯雷集团（Carlyle Group Inc.【原文：TeamViewer SE, the maker of remote-working software, is close to buying 1E from Carlyle Group Inc. in the German firm’s largest-ever acquisition, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 据说保诚正在权衡资产管理公司瀚亚的各种选择
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，保诚集团（Prudential Plc）正在考虑各种方案，包括出售其资产管理公司瀚亚投资（Eastspring Investments）的少数股权，以帮助拓宽业务。【原文：Prudential Plc is considering options including selling a minority stake in its asset manager Eastspring Investments to help broaden the business, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: Hostplus 副首席信息官 Michalakis 被任命为 Funds SA 新首席信息官
item.description: 投资额达 1,200 亿澳元（767 亿美元）的养老基金 Hostplus 的副首席投资官 Con Michalakis 已被任命为 Funds SA 的首席投资官。【原文：Con Michalakis, the Deputy Chief Investment Officer of A$120 billion ($76.7 billion) pension fund Hostplus, has been appointed chief investment officer of Funds SA.】

item.title: 欧洲的大型电池雄心正在破灭，而中国正从中受益
item.description:
Northvolt的资金紧张和当地工厂的停产削弱了该地区减少对亚洲依赖的努力。【原文：

Northvolt’s cash crunch and local factories getting canceled undermine the region’s push to reduce reliance on Asia.

】

item.title: 沙特人为何希望在海湾地区举办第二届世界杯足球赛
item.description: 近年来，沙特阿拉伯向赛车、高尔夫、网球和拳击等运动投入了数十亿美元，在全球体育界拥有巨大的影响力。现在，这个石油资源丰富的王国即将赢得世界上最负盛名的足球赛事--世界杯的主办权。世界杯赛唯一一次在阿拉伯海湾国家举办是在 2022 年，地点是小小的卡塔尔酋长国。比赛改在冬季举行，以避开炎热的天气。【原文：Saudi Arabia wields enormous influence in global sport after channeling billions of dollars into such pursuits as racing, golf, tennis and boxing in recent years. Now, the oil-rich kingdom is set to win the right to host the world’s most prestigious football tournament: the World Cup. The only time the competition has ever been held in an Arab Gulf country was in 2022, in the tiny emirate of Qatar — and it happened amid considerable controversy. Games were shifted to the winter to avoid the hot】

item.title: 马克龙扩大谈判，寻求稳定的法国政府
item.description: 埃马纽埃尔-马克龙将于周二召集众多政党举行会议，努力寻找新总理接替米歇尔-巴尼耶，巴尼耶政府上周因预算纠纷而下台。【原文：Emmanuel Macron will bring together a broad group of political parties for a meeting on Tuesday, in an effort to find a new prime minister to replace Michel Barnier, whose government was ousted last week over a budget dispute.】

item.title: 欧洲央行官员将就缩减多少才能促进经济展开争论
item.description: 欧洲央行官员一致认为，需要降低利率来提振该地区摇摇欲坠的经济。不过，他们对降息的实际帮助有多大还存在激烈的争议。【原文：European Central Bank officials agree that lower interest rates are needed to buoy the region’s shaky economy. How much they can actually help, though, is hotly contested.】
